name: mint_tokens
body: let instructions = spl_token :: instruction :: mint_to (& ctx . accounts . mint_prog . key () , & ctx . accounts . mint_acc . key () , & ctx . accounts . dest_acc . key () , & ctx . accounts . mint_authority . key () , & [] , amount ,) ? ;

invoke_signed (& instructions , & [ctx . accounts . mint_prog . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . mint_acc . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . dest_acc . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . mint_authority . to_account_info () ,] , & [] ,) ? ;
